main event: A Marinette policeman reported an unidentified flying object with rotating red and green lights on March 30, 1966.
interesting points: The UFO was observed moving up, down, sideways, backwards, and forwards at an altitude above 5,000 feet., The object exhibited multiple colors including red and green lights., The sighting was made by both a patrolman and a fireman., The report was prompted by a letter from Lt Col Michael J. Amato regarding UFO investigations., There are procedures for reporting UFO sightings to the nearest Air Force base.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with rotating lights
witness description: Marvin Erdmann, patrolman of the Marinette City Police Department, and a fireman
